Package com.mygdx.pirategame.screens

Class Shop

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.pirategame.screens.Shop
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class Shop
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Shop Screen. It is a visual representation for the skills that the game automatically unlocks for the player. They're unlocked when a points' threshold is reached.
Author:
Sam Pearson, Benjamin Whitnell
